attributes.action: Ring fence  funding to allow Talking Therapy for  all people with severe mental illness's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People with severe mental health problems under a section 2/ 3 order, at the moment are forced to take medication but are not offered or given access to Talking Therapy's by properly qualified Therapists. This has been proven to have a much higher success rate with many patients, than medication alone.  Reason. "IT IS TOO EXPENSIVE." Not good enough. Mental health has got to stop being the Cinderella of the health service.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
